content: What we need to get this issue of The Big'O' not being a citizen is a specific protest-day where thousands desend on Washington,D.C. with signs and chants like "Usurper Resign!". Bumper stickers, fly the flag upside-down, maybe a gesture like the old peace-sign we could make with our fist or finger(s). T-shirts with Fake President. Stuff like that. This issue is not going away but we must get it on the frontburner and get some media attention. They keep ignoring us and the Constitution.

content: quote: Originally posted by StaffSgtGraham: The man's mother was living in Kenya with her Kenyan/Arab polygamous Moslem husband and had the Big'O' possibly in Hawaii where she was not legally an adult nor a resident. Bumper stickers, fly the flag upside-down, maybe a gesture like the old peace-sign we could make with our fist or finger(s). T-shirts with Fake President. Stuff like that. This issue is not going away but we must get it on the frontburner and get some media attention. They keep ignoring us and the Constitution. Then you would become nothing more then the opposite side of the whacked-out, rabid, anti-Bush, ultra far left coin. Not a good place to be.

reply: Then you would become nothing more then the opposite side of the whacked-out, rabid, anti-Bush, ultra far left coin. Not a good place to be.

content: While I'm not fond of the current President, and more importantly, the state of our government in general, I think it would be in poor taste to fly the flag upside-down in order to make a political statement.

content: quote: Originally posted by StaffSgtGraham: The man's mother was living in Kenya with her Kenyan/Arab polygamous Moslem husband and had the Big'O' possibly in Hawaii where she was not legally an adult nor a resident. Oh she made her parents proud. When we don't enforce our own constitution for the highest office in the land what good is the costitution? The Constitution doesn't require one's mother to be an "adult" in order to meet the qualifications for holding the office of POTUS. Nor does it state that one's mother must be a resident of Hawaii in order to become President. I'm still reading the Constitution but I can't find anything regarding Kenyan, Arab, polygamous Moslems - please fill me in! There are an awful lot of juvenile "adults" on this forum.
